casebody.data:
Case No. 7,940. KROUSE v. SPROGELL. [1 Cranch, C. C. 78.] 1 Circuit Court, District of Columbia. March Term, 1802.

[Reported by Hon. William Cranch, Chief Judge.]

Leave to Amend.

Leave was given to defendant to withdraw the general issue, and file a general demurrer, on payment of the costs of the term.
